sqlMap.insert:
SELECT #bacthNo# || RECONCILE_BATCH_SEQUENCE.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_BATCH( BATCH_NO, APPLY_COUNT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, ORGCODE, FILE_NAME, OPERATOR ) VALUES ( #bacthNo#, #applyCount#, #status#, #createDate#, #orgCode#, #fileName#, #operator# )

SELECT RECONCILE_DETAIL_sequence.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_DETAIL( ID, CHANNEL_ORDER_NO, STATUS, BATCH_NO_DETAIL, MERCHANT_NO, TRANSACTION_DATE, POSTING_DATE, TYPE, CREDORAX_STATUS, TRANSCURRENCY, TRANSAMOUNT, ACCTCURRENCY, ACCTAMOUNTGROSS, ACCTTOTALCHARGES, CAPTURE_METHOD, MERCH_TRAN_REF, AUTH_CODE, MERCHANT_NAME, TRANSACTION_COUNTRY, AREA_OF_EVENT, FPI, FEE_ERCENTAGE, BASE, INTERCHANGE_AMOUNT, INTERCHANGE_CURRENCY, DEBIT_OR_CREDITCARD, MERCHANT_CITY, ACQUIRER_REF ) VALUES ( #id#, #channelOrderNo#, #status#, #batchNoDetail#, #merchantNo#, #transactionDate#, #postingDate#, #type#, #credoraxStatus#, #transCurrency#, #transAmount#, #acctCurrency#, #acctAmountGross#, #acctTotalCharges#, #captureMethod#, #merchTranRef#, #authCode#, #merchantName#, #transActionCountry#, #areaOfEvent#, #fpi#, #feeErcentage#, #base#, #interChangeCurrency#, #interChangeAmount#, #debitOrCreditCard#, #merchantCity#, #acquirerRef# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_BATCH SET SUCCESS_COUNT= #successCount#, STATUS = #status# WHERE BATCH_NO = #bacthNo#
UPDATE RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_DETAIL SET REMARK = #remark#, STATUS = #status# where CHANNEL_ORDER_NO= #channelOrderNo#
sqlMap.select:
select BATCH_NO bacthNo, CREATE_DATE createDate, OPERATOR operator, APPLY_COUNT applyCount, SUCCESS_COUNT successCount, ORGCODE orgCode, FILE_NAME fileName, STATUS status, PREPROCESS_START_TIME preProcessStartTime, PREPROCESS_END_TIME preProcessEndTime, PREPROCESS_SUCCESS_NUM preProcessSuccessNum, BATCH_END_TIME batchEndTime, BATCH_START_TIME batchStartTime, BATCH_PROCESS_NUM batchProcessNum, PAYMENT_ORDER_NUM paymentOrderNum, PAYMENT_ORDER_SUCCESS paymentOrderSuccess, PAYMENT_ORDER_FAILED paymentOrderFailed, REFUND_ORDER_NUM refundOrderNum, REFUND_ORDER_SUCCESS refundOrderSuccess, REFUND_ORDER_FAILED refundOrderFailed, REFUND_ORDER_REMARK refundOrderRemark from RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_BATCH where 1=1
OPERATOR = #operator#
BATCH_NO = #batchNo#
CREATE_DATE >= #startTime#
CREATE_DATE <= #endTime#
order by CREATE_DATE desc

select count(1) from RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_BATCH where 1=1
OPERATOR = #operator#
BATCH_NO = #batchNo#
CREATE_DATE >= #startTime#
CREATE_DATE <= #endTime#

select A.BATCH_NO_DETAIL batchNoDetail, A.CHANNEL_ORDER_NO channelOrderNo, B.OPERATOR operator, A.STATUS status, A.REMARK remark, A.MERCH_TRAN_REF merchTranRef, B.CREATE_DATE createDate from RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_DETAIL A LEFT JOIN RECONCILE_IMPORT_RECORD_BATCH B ON A.BATCH_NO_DETAIL = B.BATCH_NO where A.BATCH_NO_DETAIL = #batchNo#
A.STATUS = #status#
order by A.STATUS desc
